content: 4.Promote yourself wisely. Many women are bad at collecting evidence of our success, let alone sharing it with others. We brush off compliments and downplay achievements. Then, when it’s time to ask for that promotion or raise, we can’t even communicate why we deserve it. Does your boss know what you’re capable of? Or even what you’ve already done? Are you making your accomplishments visible, or are you sitting quietly and hoping someone will notice your hard work? Make sure your boss and others know what you’ve contributed.
